::KitKat::

She was getting scared with these two bots.  She had never known any 
bot to enjoy pain like these two did. She sighed and thought about 
how to curb their appitite for pain.  She looked towards the 
lab. "Stay there and don't go anywhere," she said to Land Mine and 
Time Bomb.  She went to the lab and looked around.  She found an old 
torture box. She smiled, "This aught to do it. The old Pain Box."  It 
was a box big enough to put a bot in.  It had electrodes that 
protruded inward n the box. When turned on it would shock the heck 
out of who ever was inside the box.  wouldn't kill them but it might 
satisfiy them so thy wouldn't go out and get into trouble.  She 
carried it out and gave it to Time Bomb. "Here, go plug this in in 
your room and have fun."  Fun wasn't what she would call it, but it 
might keep them happy for a while.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Time Bomb ran off and told Land Mine. Soon they were both scrubbing 
the
> walls...and the floors...and the ceilings...and the whole base! 
Lets just
> say, that probably days later, they came back bleeding all over 
again.
> 
> "Brushed too much." Time Bomb said...
